Keyboard Shortcuts

Create Link (copy to clipboard)

Ctrl+C
Create link
Ctrl+Shift+C
Selected text to %text% and Create link.
If not selected, Display edit title panel and Create link.

Select Linkform

"1", "2", "3", ... "9", "0"
Direct select.
